DataListSpec.Name: Sustained Giving Revenue Channel Data List
DataListSpec.Description: A data list showing sustained giving records.
DataListSpec.Author: Blackbaud Product Development

SPDataList.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure BBDW.USR_USP_DATALIST_SUSTAINEDGIVING_REVENUECHANNEL ( @STARTDATE datetime, @ENDDATE datetime ) as set nocount on;
select rc.[REVENUECHANNELDESCRIPTION] as [CHANNEL], sum(ip.[RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENTPAYMENTAMOUNT]) as [TOTALREVENUE] from BBDW.[FACT_RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENTPAYMENT] ip inner join BBDW.[FACT_FINANCIALTRANSACTION] ft on ip.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONFACTID] = ft.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONFACTID] inner join BBDW.[DIM_REVENUECHANNEL] rc on ft.[REVENUECHANNELDIMID] = rc.[REVENUECHANNELDIMID] where (@STARTDATE is null or ft.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONDATE] > @STARTDATE) and (@ENDDATE is null or ft.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONDATE] < @ENDDATE) group by rc.[REVENUECHANNELDESCRIPTION]
